title: Beginner's Guide to CSS Fundamentals
description: In this lab, we will explore the fundamentals of CSS programming. This lab is designed to help beginners get started with CSS and learn how to use it to create beautiful and responsive web pages. Throughout the lab, we will cover various topics such as selectors, properties, and values, and provide hands-on exercises to reinforce the concepts.
